title: Orc Vocalizations
description: A Orc Vocalization sound package with 224 high-quality monster sound effects, including battle, pain and neutral vocalizations, ready for use in game scenes, animations and trailers.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/orc-vocalizations

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/kb7w8drwt2vwgth/MSE%20-%20Orc%20Vocalizations.pdf?dl=0


Orcs are medium-sized creatures, disfigured and warped by dark forces. They are fast and agile. There are taller and larger warriors among the orcs, strong but slow. 

Rumour has it that they are mutated elves.

All of its qualities formed the basis of the creature's creation and vocalization design.


The collection contains 19 voice actions, including 224 professionally designed vocalization one-shot sound effects, divided into:

  • 24 voice sounds during an attack
  • 8 battle shouts
  • 12 bite and yelp sounds
  • 4 coughs
  • 24 deaths
  • 8 exert and effort sounds
  • 8 groans
  • 24 growls
  • 4 hissing sounds
  • 8 idle and speech sounds
  • 12 sounds of jumping and action
  • 4 laughs
  • 24 pains
  • 24 roars
  • 4 sad and upset sounds
  • 8 snarling sounds
  • 12 snorting and grunting sounds
  • 4 sounds of tiredness
  • 8 victory shouts


Such a variety of vocal samples can satisfy a wide variety of needs. 


This package is ideal for creating small and medium-sized monster voices: troll, ogre, goblin, troglodyte, zombie, alien, parasite, demon and more. 


Using this asset, create an atmosphere for your project in the genre of fantasy, dark fantasy, post-apocalyptic, sci-fi, horror or any other where monsters live and roar.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 224 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 19 voice actions
  • 112 voice samples of the attacking type
  • 56 voice samples of the pain type
  • 56 neutral type voice samples
  • great for animations, trailers, game scenes for fantasy, dark fantasy, horror and more


Number of Audio Waves: 224

Number of Audio Cues: 224

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 04 minutes 33 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
